                                                                                                        몬스터 (동물)

                                                                                                        MONSTERS (ANIMALS)

                                                                                                        This section provides statistics and basic information for many common kinds of mundane animals. These creatures generally operate on instinct, driven by simple needs such as food and reproduction. Most animals, even predators, do not 공격 unless they or their young are threatened.

                                                                                                        Animals are not capable of detailed reasoning, although with the 동물 조련 skill it is possible to tame an animal and teach it to 공연 certain tricks.

                                                                                                        Some herbivorous animals do not normally use their natural 무기 to 공격. As such, their natural 무기 are treated as secondary 공격. The animal’s 공격 and 피해 entries note this fact, with an explanatory footnote.

                                                                                                        Animal Traits: An animal possesses the following traits (unless otherwise noted in a creature’s entry).

                                                                                                        —지능 score of 1 or 2 (no creature with an 지능 score of 3 or higher can be an animal).

                                                                                                        —저광시야.

                                                                                                        —성향: Always neutral. Animals are not governed by a human sense of morality.

                                                                                                        —전리품: None. Animals never possess 전리품.

                                                                                                        APE
                                                                                                        Large Animal
                                                                                                        히트 다이스:4d8+11 (29 hp)
                                                                                                        선제권:+2
                                                                                                        속도:30 ft. (6 squares), 등반 30 ft.
                                                                                                        방어도:14 (–1 size, +2 Dex, +3 natural), touch 11, flat-footed 12
                                                                                                        기본 공격/드잡이:+3/+12
                                                                                                        공격:Claws +7 melee (1d6+5)
                                                                                                        전력 공격:2 claws +7 melee (1d6+5) and bite +2 melee (1d6+2)

                                                                                                        특수 공격:—
                                                                                                        Special Qualities:저광시야, 냄새
                                                                                                        내성 굴림:Fort +6, Ref +6, Will +2
                                                                                                        능력:Str 21, Dex 15, Con 14, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 7
                                                                                                        스킬:등반 +14, 듣기 +6, 감지 +6
                                                                                                        특기:경계, 거칠음
                                                                                                        환경:Warm forests
                                                                                                        집단:Solitary, pair, or company (3–5)
                                                                                                        도전 지수:2
                                                                                                        성장:5–8 HD (Large)
                                                                                                        레벨 보정:—

                                                                                                        These powerful omnivores resemble gorillas but are far more aggressive; they kill and eat anything they can catch. An adult male 유인원 is 5-1/2 to 6 feet tall and weighs 300 to 400 pounds.

                                                                                                        전투

                                                                                                        Combat

                                                                                                        스킬: 유인원 have a +8 racial bonus on 등반 checks and can always choose to take 10 on 등반 checks, even if rushed or threatened.

                                                                                                        Medium Animal
                                                                                                        히트 다이스:1d8+1 (5 hp)
                                                                                                        선제권:+2

                                                                                                        전투

                                                                                                        The 오소리 is a furry animal with a squat, powerful body. Its strong forelimbs are armed with long claws for digging. An adult 오소리 is 2 to 3 feet long and weighs 25 to 35 pounds.

                                                                                                        전투

                                                                                                        Combat

                                                                                                        오소리 공격 with their sharp claws and teeth.

                                                                                                        내성 굴림:Fort +5, Ref +4, Will +2
                                                                                                        능력:Str 19, Dex 13, Con 15, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 6

                                                                                                        성장:4–5 HD (Medium)
                                                                                                        레벨 보정:—

                                                                                                        The black bear is a forest-dwelling omnivore that usually is not dangerous unless an interloper threatens its cubs or food supply.

                                                                                                        Black bears can be pure black, blond, or cinnamon in color and are rarely more than 5 feet long.

                                                                                                        전투

                                                                                                        Combat

                                                                                                        Black bears rip prey with their claws and teeth.

                                                                                                        스킬: A black bear has a +4 racial bonus on 수영 checks.

                                                                                                        Large Animal
                                                                                                        히트 다이스:6d8+24 (51 hp)
                                                                                                        선제권:+1
                                                                                                        속도:40 ft. (8 squares)
                                                                                                        방어도:15 (–1 size, +1 Dex, +5 natural), touch 10, flat-footed 14

                                                                                                        스킬:듣기 +4, 감지 +7, 수영 +12
                                                                                                        특기:지구력, 달리기, 추적

                                                                                                        These massive carnivores weigh more than 1,800 pounds and stand nearly 9 feet tall when they rear up on their hind legs. They are bad-tempered and territorial. The brown bear’s statistics can be used for almost any big bear, including the grizzly.

                                                                                                        전투

                                                                                                        Combat

                                                                                                        A brown bear 공격 mainly by tearing at opponents with its claws.

                                                                                                        Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a brown bear must hit with a claw 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity.

                                                                                                        스킬: A brown bear has a +4 racial bonus on 수영 checks.

A 들소 stands more than 6 feet tall at the shoulder and is 9 to 12 feet long. It weigh 1,800 to 2,400 pounds. The 들소’s statistics can be used for almost any large herd animal.
